Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity (Ps 71:6, 109:3-4):

Text.Language: Efe~i~ e~pec/t m~v~r/] cwmt/ hwou e~jen cort: nem m~v~r/] n~han teltili euy~lah hijen p~kahi.
He shall come down like rain upon the grass before mowing, Like showers that water the earth.

Csop nemak n~je ]ar,/ qen p~e~hoou n~te tekjom qen v~ouwini n~te n/eyouab: e~bolqen y~neji qajwf m~piciou n~te han a~tooui a~nok aij~vok.
With You is dominion in the day of Your power, in the splendours of Your saints: I have begotten You from the womb before the morning.
